scripts.build: tsc -p build && node build/clean.js && tsc -p src && node build/build-service-worker-metadata.js && node build/copy-files.js
scripts.start: tsc -p build && concurrently --kill-others "node build/build-service-worker-metadata.js --watch" "tsc -p src --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "tsc -p build --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "http-server -c-1 -p 8000"
